import re
from pathlib import Path
MDE_HOME = Path(".").resolve().parents[1]
MDE_HOME

[1]:

PosixPath('/mnt/cube/home/turbach/TPU_Projects/mkpy_data_examples')

[2]:

def make_pm_item_by_scn():
    stim_split_re = re.compile(
        r"(?P<soa>\d+)\s+(?P<dur>\d+)\s+(?P<evcode>\d+)\s+"
        r"(?P<type>....)=(?P<stim>.+)[\.]"
    )
    scn_paths = sorted(MDE_HOME.glob("mkstim/pictmem/*.scn"))

    header_str = ''.join(
        [
            f"{col:15}" for col in ["ccode", "phase", "condition_id", "item_id", "jpg", "scn"]
        ]
    )
    items = [header_str]
    for scn_path in scn_paths:
        with open(scn_path, 'r') as _fh:
            scn = scn_path.stem
            phase = None
            ccode = None
            for phase, ccode in [("study", 2), ("test", 1)]:
                if phase in str(scn_path):
                    break
            assert phase is not None and ccode is not None
            for line in _fh.readlines():
                fields = stim_split_re.match(line)
                if fields is None:
                    continue
                evcode = int(fields["evcode"])
                #if evcode > 100
                if evcode > 0 and evcode <= 4:
                    assert fields["type"] == "jpeg"
                    stim = fields["stim"]
                    cond = evcode
                if evcode > 100:
                    item = evcode
                    items.append(''.join(
                        [
                            f"{val:<15}"
                            for val in [
                                ccode,
                                phase,
                                cond,
                                item,
                                stim,
                                scn
                            ]
                        ]
                    )
                                )
    return "\n".join(items)

item_ids = make_pm_item_by_scn()
print(item_ids)
